questions.question: What does an entry action of a state indicate?

answers.a: Action performed after the system moves into the given state
answers.b: Action performed before system moves into the given state
answers.c: An optional action performed when system moves into the given state

questions.question: What does the guard condition depicted over the transition between any two states indicate?

answers.a: A condition that must be true for the transition to happen
answers.b: A condition that must be false for the transition to occur
answers.c: An indicator that this transition should not happen
answers.d: An event that might happen as result of the transition
